segments.text: Observing this kitchen, everything's in its place except the water issue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on the plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing steadily toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands attentively, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly, but he balances well so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the sink in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms around the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, she really hasn't noticed the flood yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids' secret mission is almost too clever.
segments.speaker: PAR
